mapper.select: select name ,description ,router_link ,button_name ,(select path from files f where f.seq = b.file_seq) as file_path from banner b where b.usable = true and type='BNT001' and location_code = 'BLT001' and date_format(#{targetDate}, '%Y%m%d') between expo_start_date and expo_end_date

select mall_name ,summary ,(select path from files f where f.seq = pi.file_seq LIMIT 1) as file_path from partner p join partner_image pi on p.seq = pi.partner_seq where channel_type = 'PTT001' and operation = 1 group by p.seq

select count(1) from (select mall_name ,summary ,(select path from files f where f.seq = pi.file_seq LIMIT 1) as file_path from partner p join partner_image pi on p.seq = pi.partner_seq where channel_type = 'PTT001' group by p.seq)t
